and kisses...not to be too mushy otherwise Blindchaos may step on 
me!!...:p)

****
> 
> Autobots
> 
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
::
> Beachcomber looked on in awe, as the ship disapeared with his 
friends.
> He ran up to RedHot, "They, they got away." he mummured.
> 
> Scattershot looked oh, "Oh no they won't, not with a Technobot." he 
then
> turned to them. "Transform, and roll out." he shouted, as he leapt 
into
> the air, and transformed into his Jet mode, speeding away towards 
the
> Arena like ship, the other Technobots followed.
> 
> Pacifix looked on as his troops were scattering. "No, not now, not
> without a plan." he said in disbelief, as the ships doors folded 
open,
> Hoist trudging out. 
> 
> "The computer is back online sir." Hoist said in ignorance to what 
was
> happening.
> ******
  :: REDHOT::

    "I don't believe it!!" The red and black seeker raged, ignoring 
Beachcomber. He ran and hovered as fast as he could towards the 
departing ship and joined Grimlock. He still fired his warning shots, 
hoping they would at least heed his warnings. He eagerly anticipated 
the help of his technobot companions.
    "I hope they cna do something to help: he thought as he weakly 
hovered along.

*****************************************

> 
> Dominjoe landed near the Constructicons and Soundwave, as they all
> looked around. The cockpit opened, and Megatron flew out of it,
> transforming into his large robot mode. He looked to his old troops, 
and
> began to speak informally.
> 
> "Greetings Decepticons, It is time to rejoin the cause you gave your
> life to Millions of years ago, that, or be oblitorated." he said, 
firing
> his fusion cannon into the air to add an exclamation point to his
> phrase.
> 
> Bonecrusher looked in awe. "It can't be, Megatron."
> 
> Rumble and Frenzy walked forward away from Proto 1000. "Yeah, we saw 
you
> die." They said in unison.
> 
> Soundwave looked at both of them, no emotion showing on his face. 
> 
> "Megatron obviously exists."
> 
> 


::Domnijoe and Blindchaos and Long Haul::

    Domnijoe's landing wasn't that graceful concidering the extra 
weight she was carrying, but she let out her occupents and stood back 
to watch Megatron his head. As Blindchaos has said to her via private 
radio signal, he had a mighty fine head.
    'I don't know what he finds so facination about Megatron" she 
mumbled to herself. "Besides him being a fine commander." She stuck 
her tongue out and stared at the constructicons, Soundwave and his 
cassettes. 
    Blindchaos wagged his dinosaur tail eagerly, his ever present grin 
still characteristic in his dinosaur form.
    "Yep. Meggy's here." he said boldly. "He's alive and ticking and 
squashing people who pester him." The ankylosaur giggled. "I like his 
style!!"
    Long Haul rolled his eyes at this display. Although he was pleased 
to see his former leader still functioned, his followers were a bit 
of...an annoyance. He turned to Soundwave.
    "How can he stand that moron?" he said, grimmacing.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
*******************************************************
